alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Duval, southeastern McMullen, northwestern Jim Wells and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rancho De La Parita to 6 miles northeast of Rosita. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Seven Sisters, Clegg, Rosita and Rancho De La Parita. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 738 and 760. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak; McMullen
